page.title: 05Social problems in Ferguslie
page.content: Our area has a lot of problems, especially{Ferguslie Park},an official Strathclyde Region area of{"multiple {deprivation "}.The kind of problems people have are {drugs,crime, {unemployment, alcohol and family {problems}and affect young people especially. Social workers are seeing fewer people because of demolition and renovation of houses.Although the number of cases has decreased, their severity has increased. Unemployment has increased in the last five years and this seems to lie behind most of the problems. The district council are improving many of the houses by rewiring, installing new heating and bathrooms and general redecoration.
